name: parallel-dev-config
description: Configuration for running all AI Jupyter Platform services in parallel

shared.name: Shared Package
shared.description: TypeScript compilation in watch mode for shared types and utilities

frontend.name: Frontend (Next.js)
frontend.description: Next.js development server with hot reload

parallel_commands.dev_all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "SHARED,FRONTEND,BACKEND" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend || echo 'Backend not available'"
